title: The Explosive Connection Between Hillary And China’s Deadly New Weapon (Ep 1628)
description:
What does Hillary Clinton have to do with the explosive story out of China this weekend? In this episode, I address the eye-opening connections between the Clintons and China’s deadliest new weapon. 

News Picks:


Hillary Clinton, Skolkovo, and hypersonic missiles. 


The John Solomon story about Skolkovo, discussed in the show today.


Discredited Christopher Steele still stands behind the ridiculous pee-pee tape.

This Chinese military test should concern all of us.

Lol. Amazon tries to prop up the reviews of the dreadful Fauci documentary.
